toast.api-error.title: An error has occurred
api-error.invalid_request: Internal error: Invalid request. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.not_found: Internal error: The resource is not found. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.forbidden: You don't have the permission to access this resource.
api-error.internal_server_error: Internal error: A fatal problem has occurred. Please contact the administrator for more information.
api-error.invalid_response_from_provider: Internal error: Unknown result returned from the authentication provider
api-error.forbidden_live: You are not authorized to watch this live. The live has not started yet or you can watch it by logging in if the streamer has set a privacy setting.
navbar.login.modal.title: Login
navbar.login.modal.body: Log in with your Mastodon account. Enter the domain of the server (e.g. knzk.me).
navbar.login.modal.help: What data do we get from your Mastodon account?
navbar.login.modal.continue: Please continue to login in a new window...
page.about.title: About this website
page.about.description.1: This website is hosted by the platform feature from the live-streaming software, KnzkLive.
page.about.description.2: Information about the server hosting this website ({domain}) is listed below.
page.about.license: KnzkLive is open source software licensed under AGPL-3.0.
page.index.live-not-found: There are currently no lives available to the public
create-live.title: 配信を開始
create-live.privacy.public: 公開: この配信は誰でも視聴できます
create-live.privacy.private: ログインが必要: 配信を視聴するにはログインが必要です
create-live.privacy.private.note: ログインが必要の場合、トップページから配信へのリンクは隠されます
create-live.privacy.private.require-foll: 視聴者はあなたのフォロワーである必要がある
あなたは視聴者をフォローしている必要がある
create-live.hashtag: コメント用ハッシュタグ
create-live.hashtag.note: 視聴者がコメントをSNSへ同時に投稿したり、SNSから投稿をコメントとして取得する機能を有効にする場合は入力してください。ハッシュタグは混乱を防ぐために他のユーザーやコミュニティが使用していないか確認してください。
live.not-pushed: The streamer is not pushing the stream at this time.
live.player.not-supported: For now, you cannot play the stream on this device. Try iPad, Android, PC, etc., as Apple, Inc does not allow the use of the necessary APIs in the iPhone.
live.player.autoplay-blocked: Auto-play has been blocked, please click the player to play.
